Projects_desc: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it.
What I have done so far: What I have done so far
Implementing responsive design and ensur: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Whats do you want to say ?: Whats do you want to say ?
about: I have been engaged in frontend development for 2 years, I have experience working with various frameworks such as: React, Vue JS and etc. I am a quick learner and I approach the implementation of projects responsibly. Let's work together to bring your ideas into the life!
name: Daniel <1> | Fedorov</1>

projects.course: Web application created as the result of successful completion of advanced frontend course. Includes a lot of technics such as FSD architecture, async reducers, custom plugins
projects.promptopia: Web application that allows users to create prompts and share them. You can also search the prompt you want and visit others uses profile page.
projects.sber: The platform is a data markup service. There are such possibilities for marking up data as marking up images with the ability to choose an answer or your own description, uploading an image for a specific request and a possible description for it.
projects.aton: A web application created for an internship assignment at Aton. Angular JS was used as a framework together with the NgRx state manager. The following functionality was implemented: authorization, pagination, notification system.
projects.portfolio: Own portfolio website presenting general information about me, work experience, completed projects and a feedback form. The site also implements 3D elements using three js, internationalization of i18n and a feedback form using EmailJs
